DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare single groin puncture bilateral groin puncture AF ablation procedure . The investigator compare 1 ) degree patient ' discomfort hemostasis questionaire , 2 ) procedure time , 3 ) complication rate , 4 ) 1-year clinical recurrence rate AF .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Single Groin Single Trans-septal Puncture Conventional Bilateral Groin Puncture Double Trans-septal Puncture Catheter Ablation Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients agreement consent 2 . Patients age 19 3. patient undergoing catheter ablation atrial fibrillation 4 . Patients vascular disease 1. patient agree study inclusion 2. persistent AF 3 . Patients vascular disease venous anomaly 4 . Patients structural abnormality heart
